page.title: 03Winter Half Term
page.content: In winter the roads are deserted because the East wind is too cold for the holidaymakers.All the caravan sites and amenities are closed down.When the weather is not too bad my friends and I go for a bike ride to the beach and gaze out at the sea. Often in the afternoons I take our dog for a walk to the park.He is usually quite lively in the mornings so I get the ball and play with him in the back garden.Some winter days it is too cold to be outside so I go and call for my friends.Then we watch television or play with our games.When there is nothing to do,instead of just being bored, I help my Mum.Sometimes I dust the furniture or at other times I bake some cakes for tea.
